title: How to Draw the Indian Flag

steps.title: Divide it into three equal horizontal sections.
steps.content: Divide it into three equal horizontal sections.

steps.title: Color the topmost section with saffron color.
steps.content: Color the topmost section with saffron color.

steps.title: Color the bottom most section with dark green color.
steps.content: Color the bottom most section with dark green color.

steps.title: Draw a navy blue circle at the centre of the middle section.
steps.content: Draw a navy blue circle at the centre of the middle section.

steps.title: Divide the circle into 4 equal sections.
steps.content: Divide the circle into 4 equal sections.

steps.title: Draw 5 navy blue spokes between every section, so that you end up with 24 spokes in total.
steps.content: Draw 5 navy blue spokes between every section, so that you end up with 24 spokes in total.
